mapper.sql: gnum as gNum, pnum as pNum, regid as regId, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:MI:SS') as regDt
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOOD WHERE GNUM = #{gNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REGID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOOD ( PNUM, REGID, REGDT ) VALUES ( #{pNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT g.gnum as gNum, MIN(i.SAVE_FILE_NM) as saveFileNm, p.PNAME as pName, p.BPRICE as bPrice, p.DISCOUNT as discount, p.DPRICE as dPrice, g.REGID as regId FROM GOOD g JOIN IMAGE i ON g.pNum = i.refNum JOIN PRODUCT p ON g.pnum = p.pnum
GROUP BY g.gnum, p.PNAME, p.BPRICE, p.DISCOUNT, p.DPRICE, g.REGID ORDER BY gNum
